* Care: Rinse and dry.
* Disposal: Put it in compost.

Grab this bundle today and make your year more sustainable, one product at a time!

entry.title: Charcoal Handmade Cold Processed Soap
entry.summary:
Vendor: Almitra Sustainables
Type:
Price: 290.00

“Where the alchemy of nature meets the artistry of human hands.”

Our handmade cold processed soaps are inspired from a journey that transformed the way we perceive nature and surrendering ourselves to its age-old wisdom. Immersing in the alchemy of nature, learning to discern the language of leaves, the secrets held within roots, and the healing essence of wildflowers. These handmade soaps remind us that the alchemy of herbalism is not merely a craft but a communion, a bridge between the wisdom of the nature and the nurturing hands that shape it.

Our Charcoal handmade cold processed soap holds the purifying power of activated Charcoal powder and the moisturizing properties of oils that makes a invigorating blend which gives this soap its cleansing and detoxifying quality.

#Wisdomofages : A healing wonder from ashes, charcoal metaphorically leaves its mark for ages as a natural cleanser.

Our Soaps are Handmade with fresh All-natural ingredients using cold process soapmaking. NO harmful chemicals or preservative.

-Vegan

-Natural

-Cold process

-No synthetic preservatives

Ingredients: Safflower Oil, Coconut Oil, Kokum butter, Activated Charcoal Powder, Essential oils of Vetiver, Rosemary & Frankincense.

Weight : 100 gm

Shelf Life : Best before 24 months

Wake Up Your Skin with the Power of Caffeine & Cocoa

Elevate your daily cleanse with the irresistible aroma and energizing power of Chocolate Coffee Cold Process Soap by Almitra Sustainables. Handcrafted in small batches using the traditional cold process method, this soap bar combines the antioxidant-rich benefits of pure cocoa with the natural exfoliation of ground coffee beans to gently buff away dead skin while deeply nourishing it.

Formulated with plant-based oils, this vegan, cruelty-free, and plastic-free soap is perfect for those seeking a zero-waste, skin-loving alternative to synthetic body washes. The subtle blend of chocolate and coffee awakens the senses and leaves your skin feeling smooth, refreshed, and invigorated.

A Calming, Skin-Loving Bar for Daily Self-Care

Elevate your skincare ritual with our Lavender Cold Process Soap, lovingly handcrafted by Almitra Sustainables using traditional cold-process methods. Infused with the calming essence of lavender and enriched with nourishing plant-based oils, this bar delivers a gentle yet effective cleanse while soothing the senses with every use.

Bring intention and sustainability to your everyday cooking with our 7-piece Neem Wood Kitchen Ladle Set. Thoughtfully handcrafted by skilled artisans, this eco-friendly utensil set is made from 100% natural neem wood—known for its antibacterial properties, durability, and non-toxic nature.

entry.title: The Lazy Monkey – Hand Block Printed Muslin Blanket
entry.summary:
Vendor: Almitra Sustainables
Type:
Price: 2100.00

““As we jumped from one bed time story to another,

Those dreamy eyes started growing smaller.

As sweet little dreams came knocking at the door,

And Under a blanket of clouds they snored.”

Snuggle up your little one in our traditional hand block printed baby blankets woven from the finest cotton muslin to make snuggle time cozy and warm. With a playful pattern of “The Lazy Monkey” that will keep your little one occupied amidst the tales of Nature.

Our baby blankets are handcrafted by skilled artisans from Rajasthan in India. The style of handblock print used is specific to this region which preserves this art, as more than skill it is their identity and voice. These blankets make for a perfect heirloom to pass down through generations.

Our blankets are made from three thick layers of the finest quilted GOTS certified organic cotton muslin with a 100% pure cotton filling, making them both child & environment friendly. As the babies grow these blankets can serve multi-purpose as a swaddle blanket, nursery receiving blanket, stroller canopy, comfy travel blanket, burp cloth, nursing cover, play mat, and more.

*Note – Some irregularities like missing print, light and dark areas, fabric joint, little smudges are not considered as flaw but as beauty of hand block print.”

Dimensions: 112×112 cm | 44×44 in

Features:

– 0-3 years

– Hand block printed & hand-quilted.

– Azo-free dye pigment block printing.

– Suitable for all seasons

– 3 layers of muslin cotton cover

– Lightweight, soft and breathable

How To Care?

All of our muslin light weight, super soft, and will get even softer, puffing up like a little happy cloud with every wash.

Machine wash in Cold water gentle/ delicate mode only (30c or low). Use mild detergent. Air dry in shade. Do not bleach.

entry.title: Kitchen Hard Scrub Brush
entry.summary:
Vendor: Almitra Sustainables
Type:
Price: 180.00

Burnt the bottom of your cooker while cooking rice or your Pan while cooking some curry? Then you know the headache of getting rid of those burnt marks!

While metal scourers does the job but it comes with a price. The sharp edges of these scourers can cut into the skin; it leaves scratch marks on the kitchenware; they slowly start to shed which is detrimental as eventually it can end up in your food.

To tackle this mindfully we have designed a natural hard scrub brush made from the Bassine fiber. Yes unlike coir, this fiber is more on the tougher side derived from the Palmyra Palms and is known to have an excellent durability and efficient cleaning property which can take up any intense cleaning task.

Features:

– Comfortable wooden handle with a groove that allows for a perfect grip.

– Palm size brush to easily reach the tight spots.

– Unlike heavy scratches that come from using metal scourers, the marks left by our brush are much faint and milder.

Now do away with the burnt marks in your kitchenware easily with our Kitchen Hard Scrub Brush. This brush is Sustainable and proudly made in India by the local artisans

*Note- not suitable for use on coated utensils.

*Size – Length – 10 cm | Bristle Length – 1.5 cm |Brush Width – 3 cm

*Material – Plant-Based, Handle: wood Bristle: Bassine Fibre

*Care – Rinse with mild soapy water and hang in the sun to dry.

*Disposal – put it in Compost

*Packaging – We ensure that all our packaging is Eco-friendly

entry.summary:
Vendor: Almitra Sustainables
Type:
Price: 720.00

Our Coconut Coir Toilet Brush is an earthy and natural cleaning tool to keep the environment in your house clean and safe. The brush has strong and durable bristles which are made from Coconut Coir. Along with an ergonomically designed wooden handle this brush is comfortable to hold and gets cleaning done in a jiffy.

This brush is minimal and sustainable cleaning essential to do away with plastic and live mindfully.

What Is Coir?

The coir is extracted from the husk of coconuts which is usually discarded after its juice and meat have been consumed. Considered merely but a waste we use this coir to make natural cleaners to create a plastic-free safe environment. The coconut fiber is naturally antimicrobial.

  • Zero-Waste Packaging – Eco-conscious inside and out
  • Odor-Resistant & Quick-Drying – Prevents bacterial buildup and lasts longer
  • Handcrafted by Local Artisans – Supporting ethical and sustainable livelihoods

Ideal For

  • Cleaning stainless steel, iron, and brass utensils
  • Scrubbing dishes, cutlery, and tough cooking stains
  • Zero-waste homes, conscious kitchens, and eco-swaps

Care Instructions

After each use, rinse thoroughly and allow to air dry. Compost it at the end of its life.
